Fix for GH80 Wii, made by DHA.


There were some small problems found in GH80, so i&#039;ve released a fix for them.

This should fix
- "What I Like About You" - The Romantics has the original paranoid audio track
- in the setlist "I Wanna Rock" is credited to "scandal" instead of "twister sister"
- "Caught in a Mosh" - Anthrax freezes the game on loading.

I&#039;ve only managed to test the first too issues, but the third should be fixed too.
Although, due to "Caught in a Mosh" being a much longer song compared to "The Metal",
the song being replaced, I had to cut out the Rhythm track, meaning that COOP won&#039;t
be available. I tried many methods to avoid this but it wasn&#039;t possible.

Some other tweaks I have made are:

- Intro movie been changed to original GH80 intro.
- Years been added to all tracks.


So this fix isn&#039;t necessary, it&#039;s just for those that want a perfect copy.

For news on my other work, to show appreciation, or just Chill, Relax and Max all
cool, head on over to www.3media.co.uk/DHA
Enjoy!


To apply this fix:

I&#039;ve created a very simple PPF file, for those that don&#039;t already know, this file
will patch your .iso, applying all the fixes that I have created. All you have to
do is follow these simple instructions.

1. Unrar "GH3 80s.part001.rar", the GH80 Wii game.
2. Unrar "GH80 Wii Fix" to the same folder as your .iso.
3. Run "ppf-o-matic3.exe".
4. Direct the program to "Guitar Hero III.iso" on the first line.
5. Direct the program to "patch.ppf" on the second line.
6. Click "Apply".
7. Burn the Disk.
8. Rock Out!
9. Visit www.3media.co.uk/DHA and donate your life savings.
